description: The Convey WB Hooded Jacket Men is a very lightweight and compressible weather protection jacket for your next outdoor adventure. On hikes, a special DWR treatment on the outer material provides impressive water-repellent properties. The hood also protects you from the effects of the weather. Particularly useful: the Convey WB Hooded Jacket Men can be easily stowed in the chest pocket if you don’t happen to need it.
name: Mammut Convey WB Hooded Jacket - Mens
